Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style patterned pottery chalice with part of handle; glaze fired orange; white slip; interior glazed; exterior mostly reserved; above handle zone, single fine line; glaze on handle; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 21.18)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0972) (phase 2)
